verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
To <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> To <S%H995>discern<s%> the <S%H561>sayings<s%> of <S%H998>understanding,<s%>
To <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> in <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H7919>behavior,<s%> <S%H6664>Righteousness,<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H4339>equity;<s%>
To <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6195>prudence<s%> to the <S%H6612>naive,<s%> To the <S%H5288>youth<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion,<s%>

A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H3254>increase<s%> in <S%H3948>learning,<s%> And a man of <S%H995>understanding<s%> will <S%H7069>acquire<s%> <S%H8458>wise<s%> <S%H8458>counsel,<s%>
To <S%H995>understand<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H4426>figure,<s%> The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> and their <S%H2420>riddles.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> <S%H191>Fools<s%> <S%H936>despise<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> your father's <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> And do not <S%H5203>forsake<s%> your mother's <S%H8451>teaching;<s%>
<S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> they are a <S%H2580>graceful<s%> <S%H3880>wreath<s%> to your <S%H7218>head,<s%> And <S%H6060>ornaments<s%> about your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> <S%H6601>entice<s%> you, Do not <S%H14>consent.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> with us, Let us <S%H693>lie<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood,<s%> Let us <S%H6845>ambush<s%> the <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause;<s%>
Let us <S%H1104>swallow<s%> them <S%H2416>alive<s%> like <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> Even <S%H8549>whole,<s%> as those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit;<s%>
We shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds] of <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1952>wealth,<s%> We shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> our <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H7998>spoil;<s%>
<S%H5307>Throw<s%> in your <S%H1486>lot<s%> with us, We shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3599>purse,<s%> "
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> do not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> with them. <S%H4513>Keep<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> from their <S%H9350>path,<s%>
For their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H9563>evil,<s%> And they <S%H4116>hasten<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
<S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> it is <S%H2600>useless<s%> to <S%H2219>spread<s%> the <S%H7568>net<s%> In the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1167>bird<s%><S%H3671>;<s%>
But they <S%H693>lie<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> for their own <S%H1818>blood;<s%> They <S%H6845>ambush<s%> their own <S%H5315>lives.<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> are the <S%H734>ways<s%> of <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H1214>gains<s%> by <S%H1214>violence;<s%> It <S%H3947>takes<s%> away the <S%H5315>life<s%> of its <S%H1167>possessors.<s%>
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> <S%H7442>shouts<s%> in the <S%H2351>street,<s%> She <S%H5414>lifts<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the <S%H7339>square;<s%>

At the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1993>noisy<s%> [streets] she <S%H7121>cries<s%> out; At the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> she <S%H559>utters<s%> her sayings: <S%H561><s%>

<S%H4970>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long,<s%> <S%H4970><s%> O <S%H6612>naive<s%> <S%H6612>ones,<s%> will you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H9467>simplicity<s%>? And <S%H9238>scoffers<s%> <S%H2530>delight<s%> themselves in <S%H3944>scoffing,<s%> And <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?

<S%H7725>"Turn<s%> to my <S%H9640>reproof,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5042>pour<s%> out my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> on you; I will <S%H3045>make<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to you.

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> I <S%H7121>called,<s%> and you <S%H3985>refused;<s%> I <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H7181>paid<s%> <S%H7181>attention;<s%>
And you <S%H6544>neglected<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> And did not <S%H14>want<s%> my <S%H9640>reproof;<s%>
I will <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at your <S%H343>calamity;<s%> I will <S%H3932>mock<s%> when your <S%H6343>dread<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%>

When your <S%H6343>dread<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> like a <S%H7584>storm,<s%> And your <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> on like a <S%H5492>whirlwind,<s%> When <S%H6869>distress<s%> [and] <S%H9474>anguish<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on you.
<S%H227>"Then<s%> they will <S%H7121>call<s%> on me, but I will not <S%H6030>answer;<s%> They will <S%H7836>seek<s%> me <S%H7836>diligently,<s%> but they shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> me,
<S%H8478>Because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> And did not <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"They <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H14>accept<s%> my <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> They <S%H5006>spurned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H9640>reproof.<s%>
"So they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their own <S%H1870>way,<s%> And be <S%H7646>satiated<s%> with their own <S%H4156>devices.<s%>
"For the <S%H4878>waywardness<s%> of the <S%H6612>naive<s%> shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> them, And the <S%H7962>complacency<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> shall destroy them.
"But he who <S%H8085>listens<s%> to me shall <S%H7931>live<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> And shall be at <S%H7599>ease<s%> from the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of <S%H9567>evil.<s%>"
